title: Meet the retired oil exec plugging forgotten wells to reduce emissions

multiple-choice.question: What is the estimated number of orphan oil and gas wells in the United States?
Why are orphan wells a problem?

options.label: A
options.text: They can contaminate groundwater and leak oil and salt.

options.label: B
options.text: They can only leak methane gas.

options.label: C
options.text: They can only leak carbon dioxide.

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the non-profit organization founded by Curtis Shuck to plug orphan wells?
What is the estimated cost of plugging a well, depending on the geology?
What is the name of the bill introduced by Senator Ben Ray Lujan and Senator Kevin Kramer to address the problem of orphan wells?
